text: Hi there! Is there any way for me to hide the chat _launcher_ in certain scenarios (such as when other modals are open), but leave the iframe alone otherwise? What I want to achieve is being able to launch the chat from custom links (`window.HubSpotConversations.widget.open()`) while hiding the built-in launcher
Currently both the launcher and the chat lives inside the iframe, ruling `#HubSpot-messages-iframe-container { display: none !important; }` out as a fix
Hi team! Who knows how to add a *tag filter* to *custom search* modules? :eyes::i_love_you_hand_sign:
